title: Dampfire
summary: Dampfire is a tiny game I made for One Game Mechanic Jam where you basically try and protect a campfire from being put out by malicious buckets of water.
long_summary: Dampfire is a tiny game I made for One Game Mechanic Jam where you basically try and protect a campfire from being put out by malicious buckets of water. As the jam's name implies, you were only supposed to have one game mechanic.

gallery.caption: Made for One Game Mechanic Jam
Protect the fire from the buckets
Don't let the fire get too dim
